001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import android.widget.TextView;
008import androidx.annotation.ColorInt;
009import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
010import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.R;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.adapter.PassphrasesAdapter.Holder;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.model.Passphrase;
014import java.util.List;
015
016public class PassphrasesAdapter extends RecyclerView.Adapter<Holder> {
017
018  private final List<Passphrase> passphrases;
019  private final OnClickListener clickListener;
020  private final OnClickListener longClickListener;
021  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
022  @ColorInt
023  private final int evenRowColor;
024  @ColorInt
025  private final int oddRowColor;
026
027  public PassphrasesAdapter(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull List<Passphrase> passphrases,
028      @NonNull OnClickListener clickListener, @NonNull OnClickListener longClickListener) {
029    this.passphrases = passphrases;
030    this.clickListener = clickListener;
031    this.longClickListener = longClickListener;
032    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
033    evenRowColor = context.getColor(R.color.even_row_color);
034    oddRowColor = context.getColor(R.color.odd_row_color);
035  }
036
037  @NonNull
038  @Override
039  public Holder onCreateViewHolder(@NonNull ViewGroup parent, int viewType) {
040    return new Holder(inflater.inflate(R.layout.item_passphrases, parent, false));
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull Holder holder, int position) {
045    holder.bind(position);
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public int getItemCount() {
050    return passphrases.size();
051  }
052
053  public class Holder extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder {
054
055    private Holder(@NonNull View itemView) {
056      super(itemView);
057    }
058
059    private void bind(int position) {
060      ((TextView) itemView).setText(passphrases.get(position).getName());
061      itemView.setBackgroundColor((position % 2 == 0) ? evenRowColor : oddRowColor);
062      itemView.setOnClickListener((v) -> clickListener.onClick(v, position, passphrases.get(position)));
063      itemView.setOnLongClickListener((v) -> {
064        longClickListener.onClick(v, position, passphrases.get(position));
065        return true;
066      });
067    }
068
069  }
070
071  @FunctionalInterface
072  public interface OnClickListener {
073
074    void onClick(View view, int position, Passphrase passphrase);
075
076  }
077
078}
